Bash(__NEW_LINE_4a07e25133269bf4__ python3 << 'EOF'
import subprocess, time, statistics, sys

RUNS = 5  # 5 runs for better accuracy

benchmarks = {
    "fib": {
        "c": f"benchmarks/cpu/.build/fib_c",
        "rust": f"benchmarks/cpu/.build/fib_rust",
        "go": f"benchmarks/cpu/.build/fib_go",
        "node": "node benchmarks/cpu/fib/fib.js",
        "python": "python3 benchmarks/cpu/fib/fib.py",
        "ruby": "ruby benchmarks/cpu/fib/fib.rb",
        "baseline_vm": f"target/release/blc run benchmarks/cpu/fib/fib.bl",
        "baseline_jit": f"target/release/blc run --jit benchmarks/cpu/fib/fib.bl",
    },
    "tak": {
        "c": f"benchmarks/cpu/.build/tak_c",
        "rust": f"benchmarks/cpu/.build/tak_rust",
        "go": f"benchmarks/cpu/.build/tak_go",
        "node": "node benchmarks/cpu/tak/tak.js",
        "python": "python3 benchmarks/cpu/tak/tak.py",
        "ruby": "ruby benchmarks/cpu/tak/tak.rb",
        "baseline_vm": f"target/release/blc run benchmarks/cpu/tak/tak.bl",
        "baseline_jit": f"target/release/blc run --jit benchmarks/cpu/tak/tak.bl",
    },
    "divsum": {
        "c": f"benchmarks/cpu/.build/divsum_c",
        "rust": f"benchmarks/cpu/.build/divsum_rust",
        "go": f"benchmarks/cpu/.build/divsum_go",
        "node": "node benchmarks/cpu/divsum/divsum.js",
        "python": "python3 benchmarks/cpu/divsum/divsum.py",
        "ruby": "ruby benchmarks/cpu/divsum/divsum.rb",
        "baseline_vm": f"target/release/blc run benchmarks/cpu/divsum/divsum.bl",
        "baseline_jit": f"target/release/blc run --jit benchmarks/cpu/divsum/divsum.bl",
    },
}

for bench_name, langs in benchmarks.items\(\):
    print\(f"\\n{'='*60}"\)
    print\(f"  {bench_name}"\)
    print\(f"{'='*60}"\)
    results = []
    for lang, cmd in langs.items\(\):
        times = []
        output = None
        for i in range\(RUNS\):
            start = time.perf_counter\(\)
            r = subprocess.run\(cmd, shell=True, capture_output=True, text=True\)
            elapsed = time.perf_counter\(\) - start
            times.append\(elapsed\)
            if output is None:
                output = r.stdout.strip\(\)
        median = statistics.median\(times\)
        results.append\(\(median, lang, output\)\)
        sys.stdout.flush\(\)

    # Sort by time
    results.sort\(\)
    c_time = next\(\(t for t, l, _ in results if l == "c"\), results[0][0]\)

    for t, lang, output in results:
        ratio = t / c_time
        print\(f"  {lang:16s}  {t:7.3f}s  {ratio:5.1f}x C  \(output: {output[:20]}\)"\)
    sys.stdout.flush\(\)

print\(\)
EOF)

Bash(/tmp/test_match_string.bl << 'EOF'
@prelude\(core\)

fn classify\(s: String\) -> String =
  match s
    "hello" -> "greeting"
    "bye" -> "farewell"
    _ -> "unknown"

test "match hello" = classify\("hello"\) == "greeting"
test "match bye" = classify\("bye"\) == "farewell"
test "match other" = classify\("foo"\) == "unknown"
EOF)
